Mental Status Exam.name: Mental Status Exam
Mental Status Exam.description: Components of the mental status examination including appearance, behavior, speech, thought process, and cognitive functioning.

Psychiatric ROS.name: Psychiatric ROS
Psychiatric ROS.description: Psychiatric review of systems covering mood, psychosis, anxiety, trauma, ADHD, and other psychiatric symptom domains.

Past Psychiatric History.name: Past Psychiatric History
Past Psychiatric History.description: Prior psychiatric hospitalizations, suicide attempts, and treatment history.

Assessment.name: Assessment
Assessment.description: Clinical assessment including risk level and prognosis.

Plan.name: Plan
Plan.description: Treatment planning including therapy referrals and follow-up timeframes.

Substance Use.name: Substance Use
Substance Use.description: Substance use history including alcohol, cannabis, stimulants, opioids, benzodiazepines, tobacco, and other substances.

Social History.name: Social History
Social History.description: Social determinants of health including living situation, employment, education, relationships, and support systems.
